attributes.action: Ozzy Osbourne to receive a Knighthood for services to music
attributes.additional_details: Ozzy Osbourne has been a major influencer in the rock music scene since 1970 along with the band Black Sabbath . For over 50 years he has inspired many musician through out the World. A true rags to riches story that has and still does encourages  the younger generation that all things are possible
attributes.background: After over 50 years John Michael "Ozzy" Osbourne is still a leader and an inspirational icon  in the music industry. For this he deserves to be recognised and awarded a Knighthood

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
